name: Liam Kennedy
personal_summary: Passionate software developer looking to transition into a new technology stack and experience new challenges. Always looking to keep learning new skills in various fields, push for innovation, and find a forward thinking, technology focussed company I can be excited to work for.

education.title: A Levels in Maths with Statistics, Psychology, Human Biology

experience.title: IT Developer
info: Created a Vue.js app deployed to Azure with Azure DevOps within a short deadline to interface with an existing API after problems arose with an existing app.
Kickstarted development of a chatbot to solve a problem within the business and drive innovation using Azure resources and Node.js.
Bug fixing and investigation on legacy software that was handed over by another team.

experience.title: IT Developer
info: Worked to improve data quality and identify problem areas in preparation for changes to the water industry, using SQL Server Reporting Services.
Used ASP.NET and Windows Forms to create tools for internal use.

interests: Interested in all things technology, playing video and board games and reading manga. I run a fantasy Ice Hockey league for a group of friends and act as Dungeon Master for a small Dungeons & Dragons game.
